Terms

This is a contract. This is a legal contract between you and Numa. By using Numa, you indicate your agreement to this contract.

Ownership and responsibility for content. Numa agrees that you retain all legal rights to the content that you post. You are responsible for your content, and you may edit or delete your content.

Deletion of Content/Termination of Account. Numa reserves the right to delete or block access to any content that you post if Numa determines that your content is inappropriate for any reason, including Numa's determination that the content infringes on another's intellectual property rights. Numa provides the following examples of inappropriate content as a guideline, but this list is not all inclusive and it is subject to change:

Content that infringes intellectual property rights Defamatory content Content that violates the privacy rights of others Advertising Viruses and the like Hate speech Harassment Statements intended to perpetrate a fraud Pornography.

Posting of inappropriate content may lead to the termination of your account. Repeated copyright infringement will lead to the termination of your account.

Numa reserves the right to delete accounts that it determines are inactive without notice.

Limited Warranty and Disclaimer of Warranties. Numa makes no express, implied or statutory warranties, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particulary purpose, or arising from a course of dealing, trade usage or trade practice.

Limitation of Liability. In no event will Numa be liable for any lost revenue, profit or data, or for special, indirect, consequential, incidental, or punitive damages however caused and regardless of the theory of liability arising out of the use of or inability to use Numa or arising out of any content posted on Numa even if Numa has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

Loss of data. From time to time, Numa may go down and some (or all) of your data could be lost. Please understand that we cannot be held responsible or liable for data that is irretievable, damaged, or altered. We are constantly trying to improve our site and technologies.

Changes to Terms of Use. This Web site and these Terms of Use may be changed by Numa with or without notice. Please review this page regularly for changes. Continued use of this Web site following any change constitutes your acceptance of the change.
